chetna vatsa
Local Guide·13 reviews
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
I wish there was an option to give more than 5 stars to this place. BEST FOOT MASSAGE i have ever received by Simon here. I was feeling like walking on  clouds after that foot massage. Absolutely amazing! It is not a very private place therefore I have only tried foot massage here but my partner have tried full body massage as well and he was very happy with the service. The staff is very polite and they put a timer for the massage duration for complete transparency. Pricing is very reasonable too.

I've got my 90mins. Foot massage done by Simon.  And it was perfectly amazing. He is very gentle. The ambiance of the spa is a totally relaxing feels. Thank you for a job well done 💋

Rated 5.0 out of 5,
Great massage at a great price. Tried the 60 minute foot massage, which made me feel like walking on clouds, and the full body massage, which was 90 minutes of pure relaxation, after which i felt amazing! Can absolutely recommend, very clean and professional place.

Musho Pea
Local Guide·1,125 reviews·6,379 photos
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
Cindy really tries to ease all your tensions away. I feel much lighter after my massage.

For $66 and 90min, I feel it's one of the more affordable massages, however the space is cramped and tiny.

But the massage is still very good and they use hot stones and hot cushions which is very relaxing.

Haida Ismail
Local Guide·71 reviews·65 photos
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
Just had a foot massge at Lyna Vietnam Massage & Spa. Been quite a few foot massage around this area including People's Park, and I think I found that suits my liking. The staffs was very welcoming. My masseur was called, Simon. He's a wonderful masseur and makes me feel relax. There are some bruises on my knee and he is very careful with it. At the end of the message, he applied some ointment on my bruised knee and gently rubbed on it - appreciate this little thing. I will definitely come back again !
